description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ns88","text":"This protocol outlines the differentiation of stem cells into regionally specific ventral midbrain and cortical astrocytes.\nThe protocol is a 4–5-month procedure and requires media changes 3 times a week. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4vojs","text":"Seeding density reference and expansion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6acue","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2iduk","text":"3 spheres are plated into a 48 well plate \u003e 24 well plate \u003e12 well plate \u003e 6-well plate \u003e T-25 \u003e T75 \u003e T175","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ljuv","text":"P0 is when you first seed them into 2D format","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ou4k","text":"At P10 VMDA astrocytes \u003e MAX Passage ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcq6t","text":"At P12 Cortex astrocytes \u003e MAX Passage","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3bas","text":"At P10 Spinal cord astrocytes \u003e MAX Passage","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e390p","text":"Disassociate D13 VMDA diff or D19 Cortex diff using Accutase for  to   ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"832hq","text":"Collect cells as small clumps and inhibit using respective diff media + Ri 1:1000","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pqvl","text":"Spin down cells at   for  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2nsrr","text":"Aspirate media and resuspend in respective diff media (with factors required for diff) + Ri 1:1000. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qb7r","text":"Seed 20 000 cells/ well in a 96-well round bottom plate","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t2lm","text":"Spin plate at  for   ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ev9o","text":"After  , change the media with Astro base + EGF (20ug/ml stock; 20 ng/ml final\n1:1000 dilution) and hLIF (10ug/ml stock; 20ng/ml final 1:500 dilution)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":360,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"6":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhn73","text":"When spheres have been in hLIF and EGF for 4 weeks change the media to EGF (20ug/ml\nstock; 20 ng/ml final 1:1000 dilution) + FGF2 (100ug/ml stock; 20ng/ml final 1:5000 dilution)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpdim","text":"EGF and FGF2 is maintained for a minimum of 2 months. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ve8i","text":"When spheres become 0.5cm or larger it is time to chop them to axonotomise the neurons","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81lka","text":"Aspirate media and slice spheres using an autoclaved blade or two needles. Slice spheres\nin one direction then rotate plate 90° and slice again. Continue to rotate until you’ve reached 360°","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6kqf","text":"Add   of PBS and move sliced spheres into a 15ml Falcon tube","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6rf5r","text":"Let sphere settle and aspirate PBS","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahmn","text":"Resuspend in   DNase (1mL in large amount of starting material) and incubate at   for  . Shake tube every few minutes to distribute DNase through fragments","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":80,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8g8m","text":"To DNase/cell mixture add  Astro base supplemented w/FGF2 and EGF and re-plate in a new low attachment 10cm plates","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3me28","text":"After  , media change spheres with   Astro base supplemented w/FGF2 and EGF to wash out DNase","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"6":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcsld","text":"When spheres have been in EGF+FGF2 for 2 months and have been sliced a minimum of 3\ntimes they can be plated down in 2D format","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bom9","text":"Coat plates using 1:80 MG","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3oc2c","text":"Use the Worthington kit manual to reconstitute the Papain powder and make up all other reagents","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euoos","text":"Transfer spheres to a 15ml falcon tube and wash with PBS-/-. Aspirate PBS -/- once spheres have settled","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3uv2t","text":"Add Papain DNase mixture to the spheres (Usually double the amount of Papain to volume of spheres) and incubate at   for    to  . Perform triturates at every 5-minute interval\n**NOTE: If your spheres are healthy and quite large you might need to manually pull them apart before adding Papain like what we do for cutting","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":121,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"33eob","text":"At the end of 15 minutes, triturate again and let large clumps settle to the bottom and take off all supernatant (this contains a lot of single cells)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4oc3r","text":"Add supernatant to new tube and inhibit with base media","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m3v9","text":"Add new Papain, and repeat step 3-5 until clumps are disassociated (you will not be able to dissociate the whole thing so some clumps will be left, no longer than 45 minutes).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f6eq","text":"Spin cells that were inhibited at   for  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5bpjn","text":"Aspirate supernatant and resuspend in   ovomucoid inhibitor +DNase (see Worthington manual)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"94kr6","text":"In a separate tube, add   of inhibitor albumin. Slowly transfer the cell solution onto the top of the protein gradient and leave to settle. **Note:  the Worthington manual says to spin down, this is not necessary","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ath94","text":"Transfer the top layer of cells to a fresh tube","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cik7h","text":"Centrifuge at   for  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":7,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":8,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ejrlq","text":"Resuspend in EGF + FGF2 (DO NOT ADD Ri) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ends6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"6":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"7":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"8":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"engnc","text":"To freeze astrocytes at the precursor stage, perform prep as normal however resuspend in Astrocyte base media + 10% DMSO","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"744pe","text":"To mature the astrocytes, maintain  in CNTF 1:1000 + base media for 2 weeks","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3u1h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Generating regionally specified astrocytes
